thread.title: Mazars USA Continues to Grow Manufacturing & Distribution Practice with Addition of Raphy Soussan

author: cnbc.com
title: Mazars USA Continues to Grow Manufacturing & Distribution Practice with Addition of Raphy Soussan

organizations.name: mazars usa continues to grow manufacturing & distribution practice
partner in the manufacturing & distribution practice group
said mazars usa manufacturing & distribution practice

text:
NEW YORK, Feb. 5, 2018 /PRNewswire/ -- Mazars USA LLP, a leading accounting, tax, advisory and business consulting firm, today announced that Raphy Soussan has joined the firm as a Partner in the Manufacturing & Distribution Practice Group, focusing on serving multinational Consumer Products and Food & Beverage clients. Raphy possesses over 25 years of experience providing auditing, accounting, SEC and GAAP financial reporting including financial planning, tax and business advisory services to a variety of multinational, middle market and start-up companies.
Said Mazars USA Manufacturing & Distribution Practice Leader, Kathryn Byrne, "Raphy's experience serving a range of clients in the Consumer Products and Food & Beverage industries will be extremely valuable to our existing clients and future clients in these sectors, as we continue to grow. We're all very pleased that he'll be working with us."
Prior to joining Mazars USA, Raphy worked at Big Four and mid-size accounting firms, helping clients streamline their operations and achieve their financial objectives.
"I'm very excited to be joining Mazars during this time of exceptional growth," commented Raphy. "The increasing footprint of the firm in those sectors where I have expertise is a unique opportunity for me to improve my support of existing clients, while also adding value to the Mazars team. At the same time, the global reach of Mazars Group will be a major differentiator as business continues to become increasingly international in nature."
Added Kathryn, "We know that he will be successful here, on both the national and international levels."
Raphy holds a Bachelor of Arts cum laude from Queens College of the City University of New York and is a Certified Public Accountant in New York.
About Mazars USA
Mazars USA LLP provides insight and specialized skills in accounting, auditing, tax, consulting and advisory services. Since 1921, our dedicated professionals have leveraged technical industry expertise to develop customized solutions for clients, create value, and optimize their performance. As the independent U.S. member firm of Mazars Group, our global reach includes 20,000+ professionals across 86 countries. At local and global levels, we are proud of our value-added services in building lasting relationships with our clients and communities. For more information, visit us at www.mazarsusa.com .
